Articles.Content:
it was working fine last i used it(a month ago?) but when i tried to use it last night, and this morning i get this weird black cross with an x instead of its normal window.



all of my custom waypoints are still on the map and i can click to delete/rename/etc.

output log is here.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/40e46f849ym5g1i/output_log.txt?dl=0


also ive tried uninstalling/reinstalling the mod and sometimes the window opens with no contents inside and i can move it around, but most of the time its just this.

 

Edited March 21, 2018 by putnamto

so nobody has any clue as to why this happens?

i dont really have a use for the mod anymore, but if i did in the future it would be nice to use.
am i being ignored? what else do i need to put in the topic?

You should try asking in the Waypoint Manager thread, or checking that thread's post to see if anything has changed recently. My first thought is maybe it uses toolbar controller and you've not got it installed.
AFAIK, WPM 2.6.2 is for KSP 1.2.2. Try 2.7.0?
